name: JMeterInstaller
description: Find in cache or download a specific version of JMeter and prepend it to the PATH
author: Alexandre Gattiker

inputs.name: jmeterVersion
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of JMeter which should be installed on the agent if not already present

inputs.name: plugins
inputs.label: Plugins
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional list of JMeter plugins to install, e.g. `jpgc-fifo,jpgc-json=2.2`

messages.InputVersionNotValidVersion: Input version %s is not a valid version
messages.JMeterNotFoundInFolder: JMeter executable not found in path %s
messages.JMeterDownloadFailed: Failed to download JMeter from url %s. Error %s
messages.JMeterUtilityDownloadFailed: Failed to download JMeter utility from url %s. Error %s
messages.JMeterPluginManagerInstallFailed: Failed to install JMeter plugin manager. Error %s
messages.JMeterPluginInstallFailed: Failed to install JMeter plugins. Error %s

OutputVariables.name: JMeterHome
OutputVariables.description: The directory in which JMeter is installed.

OutputVariables.name: JMeterPath
OutputVariables.description: The path to the JMeter executable.
